svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The total fertility rate by world region including the UN projections through
Total Fertility Rate is defined as the average number of children that would be born to a woman over her lifetime if the woman
were to experience the exact current age-specific fertility rates, and the woman were to survive from birth to the end of her
